wallpaper-setting.wallpaper.filePath: Path of the image file to be set as wallpaper.
wallpaper-setting.slide.filePaths: Path of the image files used by the slide to be set as wallpaper.
wallpaper-setting.slide.interval.unit: Unit of measure for the Image switching interval.
wallpaper-setting.slide.random: Randomize the order in which images slide.
wallpaper-setting.slide.effect.fadeIn: Fade in when the slide image changes.
wallpaper-setting.slide.load.waitComplet: Wait for image loading to complete * Depending on the images file size, startup may be slow.
wallpaper-setting.movie.filePath: Path of the movie file to be set as wallpaper.
wallpaper-setting.favorite.startUp.rando: Randomly set wallpaper from favorite settings at startup.
wallpaper-setting.favorite.startUp.filte: Specifies the type of wallpaper to be set at start up.
wallpaper-setting.favorite.ondemand.acti: Activate the on demand switching of favorite images.
wallpaper-setting.profile.active (deprec: Activate the wallpaper set in the profile. (deprecated)
wallpaper-setting.watermark.filePath: Path of the image file to be set as watermark.
